item.title: Congress Passes GENIUS Act in Major Win for US Crypto Industry
item.description: Experts say the legislation could unleash a tidal wave of new stablecoins—and fresh complaints about President Trump’s crypto entanglements.

item.title: Cocky cop jailed for stealing bitcoins had log of his crypto theft in his office
item.description: Silk Road criminal tipped police off to dirty cop who stole 50 seized bitcoins.

item.title: GOP’s pro-industry crypto bills could financially ruin millions, lawmaker warns
item.description: Trump’s crypto bills could turn trusted Big Tech companies into the next FTX.
